name: Colgate-Palmolive Company
description: Colgate-Palmolive Company is a global leader in consumer products, focusing on oral care, personal care, home care, and pet nutrition. Established in 1806, the company has built a legacy of quality and trust, providing products that enhance the lives of consumers around the world. Colgate-Palmolive is best known for its flagship toothpaste brand, Colgate, which is synonymous with oral hygiene. The company also offers a wide array of other products, including Palmolive dish soap, Softsoap liquid hand soap, and Hill's Pet Nutrition, a premium pet food brand. With a commitment to sustainability, Colgate-Palmolive has set ambitious goals to reduce its environmental footprint, aiming for 100% recyclable packaging and a reduction in water usage in its manufacturing processes. The company operates in over 200 countries and territories, leveraging strong brand equity and extensive distribution networks. Colgate-Palmolive’s mission is to provide extraordinary products that improve the health and well-being of people and their pets, while also promoting sustainability initiatives that protect the planet for future generations. As a publicly traded company, Colgate-Palmolive is committed to delivering value to its shareholders while maintaining high standards of corporate responsibility.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
